description: You’ll love the extra breathability from the body-mapped mesh zones of this Merino wool ski sock. In fact, comfort is an understatement with this sock. Its targeted cushion puts padding on the ball and heel so your feet will feel refreshed, even after several runs. If you’re ready for a day on the slopes, this sock is ready for you.
name: Smartwool Performance Ski Targeted Cushion Print Over The Calf Socks - Mens
